source: it was on the corner of the street that he noticed the first sign of something peculiar a cat reading a map for a second mr dursley didn't realize what he had seen then he jerked his head around to look again btm
target: It was on the corner of the street that he noticed the first sign of something peculiar — a cat reading a map. For a second, Mr. Dursley didn’t realize what he had seen — then he jerked his head around to look again.
